results.title: Mesenchymal stem cell sheet transplantation combined with locally released simvastatin enhances bone formation in a rat tibia osteotomy model.
results.text_hl: Mesenchymal stem cell sheet transplantation combined with locally released @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ enhances bone formation in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Absence_of_Tibia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535563 @@@tibia@@@ osteotomy model.

citations.NLM: Qi Y, Zhao T, Yan W, Xu K, Shi Z, Wang J. Mesenchymal stem cell sheet transplantation combined with locally released simvastatin enhances bone formation in a rat tibia osteotomy model. Cytotherapy. 2013 Jan;15(1):44-56. PMID: 23260085

results.title: Locally applied simvastatin promotes fracture healing in ovariectomized rat.
results.text_hl: ...UNLABELLED: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ solution was injected subcutaneously to the site of fractured @<m>DISEASE_Absence_of_Tibia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535563 @@@tibiae@@@ of ovariectomized @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
